about_the_game:
"After a long period of global pandemic, the new virus DK-19 assailed the population. Many deniers claim that genetic mutation was a side effect caused by vaccines developed in a short period of testing and research. However, political activists fight this claim by saying that the genetic mutations of the DK-19 virus are from infected people who, in a negationist position, contracted the virus in an asymptomatic way, stimulating mutations through adverse treatments."

"Regardless of the cause of the mutations, the DK-19 virus caused great damage to the bodies of the infected, generating chaos that had long been predicted..."



ASZG is a psychological horror experience, where you must survive against creatures generated by the harmful DK-19 virus. Explore and survive in a completely devastated apocalyptic environment. The Director's Cut is an atypical version of the original game, allowing for a peculiar and highly contested edit.

WARNING: This game contains flashing lights, visual effects, loud noises and lots of jumpscares. Not recommended for highly sensitive persons.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Frequent Violence or Gore, Psychological Horror, General Mature Content.

detailed_description:
"After a long period of global pandemic, the new virus DK-19 assailed the population. Many deniers claim that genetic mutation was a side effect caused by vaccines developed in a short period of testing and research. However, political activists fight this claim by saying that the genetic mutations of the DK-19 virus are from infected people who, in a negationist position, contracted the virus in an asymptomatic way, stimulating mutations through adverse treatments."

"Regardless of the cause of the mutations, the DK-19 virus caused great damage to the bodies of the infected, generating chaos that had long been predicted..."

name: ASZG Project Director's Cut

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600K or AMD FX-9370
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 27 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 27 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

short_description: ASZG is a psychological horror experience, where you must survive against creatures generated by the harmful DK-19 virus. Explore and survive in a completely devastated apocalyptic environment. The Director's Cut is an atypical version of the original game, a peculiar and highly contested edit.
